title: The scientist
lyric: questions of science science and progress\n do not speak as loud as my heart

title: Clocks
lyric: The lights go out and I can't be save\nTides that I tried to swim against\nHave brought me down upon my knees Oh I beg, I beg and plead

title: Like a G6
lyric: Poppin' bottles in the ice, like a blizzard\nWhen we drink, we do it right gettin' slizzard\nSippin' sizzurp in my ride

title: Rollin in the Deep
lyric: There's a fire starting in my heart\nReaching a fever pitch and it's bringing me out the dark\nFinally I can see you crystal clear/Go 'head and sell me out and I'll lay your ship bare

title: DJ's got us fallin' in love
lyric: So we back in the club\nWith our bodies rockin' from side to side (side to side)\Thank God the week is done\nI feel like a zombie comin' back to life (back to life)

title: Land of Confusion
lyric: There's too many men, too many people\nMaking too many problems
